parameters.name: NumSFSymbol
parameters.description: Total number of surface finish symbols this drawing view

title: IView.IGetSFSymbols
description: Gets all of the surface finish symbols in this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumSFSymbol
parameters.description: Total number of surface finish symbols this drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of surface finish symbols VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of multi-jog leaders all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstSFSymbol
and then repeatedly calling
ISFSymbol::GetNext
to obtain the remaining multi-jog leaders in the drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetSFSymbolCount
to get the value for numSFSymbol.
